attributes.title: Do not download.
attributes.review: I downloaded this app on my iphone XR, this app completely destroyed my phone, after i downloaded the app and opened it, my phone started glitching and got extremely hot. I tried to swipe out of the app but it wouldn’t let me, and then it shut off. I put my phone on the kitchen counter and told my mom about it, my mother then told me to grab her belt, and when i gave it to her, i got severely beaten for letting an app destroy my $1,000 phone. I have bruises all over my body. I was upset so i told my dad and he was with my uncle, my dad shrugged his shoulder but my uncle was very kind and told me to go with him to his house to fix it. When we got there he told me we had to be completely naked to fix my phone and that didn’t work. So he told me we had to lay on top of each other to fix it, even that didn’t work. Then he told me he had to put something in my period hole to fix it, and even that didn’t work after about 30 minutes. We didn’t know what to do. So i went home and told my parents about my uncle helping me. This app single-handedly destroyed my phone, got me beat by my mother, and raped by my favorite uncle. DO NOT DOWNLOAD.
